definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Dr Sivak said this might be due to height difference between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 西瓦克博士说，这可能是由男女身高的差异造成的。

sentences.english: The dog's height should not exceed 40 cm, weight 10 kg.
sentences.chinese: 狗的身高不能超过40厘米，体重在10公斤以下。

sentences.english: Forget growth marks scratched in pencil on the kitchen wall.
sentences.chinese: 厨房墙壁上用铅笔画下的身高标记已经成为历史。

sentences.english: Suddenly,the door opened and a tall,fat woman came in.
sentences.chinese: 突然，门开了，一个身高体胖的女人走了进来。

sentences.english: Over the 20-year period, the average height of men did not change.
sentences.chinese: 在此20年期间，男性平均身高没有变化。

sentences.english: Hoping that they would wind up on top.
sentences.chinese: 寄希望于他们能出身高贵。

sentences.english: Your BMI is a number worked out from your height and weight.
sentences.chinese: 体重指数，是根据体重和身高，算出的数值。

sentences.english: You said do not care about my height, looks ugly.
sentences.chinese: 你说过不在乎我的身高貌寝容颜。

sentences.english: His height distinguishes him from the other boys.
sentences.chinese: 他的身高使他有别于其他男孩。

sentences.english: Throw out nonessential numbers. This  includes age, weight and height.
sentences.chinese: 别理会那些不重要的数字，包括年龄，体重，身高。

sentences.english: Don't worry about your lipstick or your height, because it's not going to matter.
sentences.chinese: 别为你的唇膏或身高而愁肠百结，因为这并不紧要。

sentences.english: He is the third tallest boy in our class.
sentences.chinese: 他是我们班身高排第三的男孩。

sentences.english: Zhou has attracted a great deal of interest because of his length and polished skills.
sentences.chinese: 凭借着身高和技术，周琦引起了很多球队的兴趣。

sentences.english: She stood three feet high and her hands rested on her hips.
My body fits on it, but barely upon it, there's no room for my big Cornish head.
sentences.chinese: 从前在康沃尔有个大个子，他的身高要长过自己的床。

definition: height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
a person of short stature/a short person
